description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating heart conditions, including surgeries and critical care.
Focuses on disorders of the brain, spinal cord, and nervous system.
Deals with the musculoskeletal system, including bones, joints, muscles, and ligaments.
Provides healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents.
Specializes in skin, hair, and nail conditions and treatments.
Provides immediate medical care for acute illnesses and traumatic injuries.
